headline: Charles River Enhances Cell Therapy Flex Platform through Collaboration with Akadeum Life Sciences
summary: WILMINGTON, Mass., September 03, 2025--Integration of Akadeum’s GMP-grade Human T Cell Leukopak Isolation Kit into Charles River’s Cell Therapy Flex Program announced today
